briefdescription.para: Portable timestamp in seconds using C11 timespec_get.
Initialize an array with pseudo-random FP32 in [-scale, +scale].

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols)
memberdef.name: gemv_rowmajor

briefdescription.para: Synthesize an embedding from a token id (deterministic).
Entry point: allocate matrices/vectors; time embed+gemv+tanh loops.

detaileddescription.para: Build via Makefile target microbench. Runs timed loops to mimic the decode inner loop and prints plain-text metrics (time and GB/s).
